name: TEA-TRICA BHA foam
description: A deep cleansing foam with BHA and Tea tree unclogs pores and exfoliates dead skin cells, leaving a refreshed finish.
KeyIngredient: Centella Asiatica Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Water, Salicylic Acid, Pinus Palustris Leaf Extract, Chamaecyparis Obtusa Water

name: Green Tea Cleansing Foam
description: A gentle cleansing foam formulated with Jeju green tea extract that thoroughly removes impurities while keeping the skin hydrated.
KeyIngredient: Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Myristic Acid, Lauric Acid

name: Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser
description: A gentle gel-type cleanser with a low pH that effectively cleanses without stripping the skin’s natural oils, perfect for sensitive skin.
KeyIngredient: Saccharomyces Ferment, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Betaine Salicylate

name: Rice Water Bright Foaming Cleanser
description: A brightening cleansing foam enriched with rice water that gently cleanses and hydrates for a radiant complexion.
KeyIngredient: Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Myristic Acid, Lauric Acid

name: Super Volcanic Pore Micellar Cleansing Foam
description: A deep cleansing foam with Jeju volcanic clusters and micellar particles to remove impurities and control sebum.
KeyIngredient: Jeju Volcanic Cluster, Glycerin, Myristic Acid, Lauric Acid

name: Blueberry Rebalancing 5.5 Cleanser
description: A rebalancing cleanser with a pH level of 5.5 that helps maintain the skin’s natural acidity while providing a fresh and hydrated finish.
KeyIngredient: Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Glycerin, Myristic Acid, Lauric Acid

name: Perfect Whip Foam
description: A rich and creamy cleansing foam that deeply cleanses while leaving the skin soft and smooth.
KeyIngredient: Sericin, Aqua, Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Myristic Acid, Lauric Acid

name: Egg White Pore Foam
description: A pore-refining cleanser with egg white extract that removes dirt and oil while minimizing the appearance of pores.
KeyIngredient: Albumen Extract, Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Myristic Acid, Lauric Acid

name: Bija Trouble Facial Foam
description: A trouble-care cleansing foam containing bija seed oil that helps soothe and care for troubled skin.
KeyIngredient: Torreya Nucifera Seed Oil, Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Myristic Acid, Lauric Acid

name: AHA/BHA Exfoliating Cleanser
description: A daily exfoliating cleanser with AHA and BHA that helps remove dead skin cells and unclog pores for a clearer complexion.
KeyIngredient: Glycolic Acid, Salicylic Acid, Betula Alba Juice, Tea Tree Leaf Oil

name: Miracle Cleansing Foam
description: A miracle foam cleanser that contains AHA, BHA, and PHA to deeply cleanse and exfoliate for clearer skin.
KeyIngredient: Salicylic Acid, Niacinamide, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Extract
